items.preText: Right, so Sri Lanka's openers are striding out. They have considerably more to chase than they would have thought at one point, but you'd think it's a chaseable total.
items.text: clipped away for the tournament's first runs! Lands on leg stump, and angling into Tamim's body. He uses his wrists to play this towards fine leg
items.shortText: Malinga to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: slower ball, back of a length outside off and shaping further away. Liton sticks his bat out but pulls it back real fast
items.shortText: Malinga to Liton Das, no run

items.preText: Eugene LaBrooy: "Winning the Asia Cup is the final result at the end of the tournament. Mathews is focusing on the end of the tournament even before it starts. He would do well to focus on his first game against a strong Bangladesh team. Try hard, play sensible cricket and win the first game first. That's what Mathews should be focusing on."
items.text: length ball on off, and angling away again. Liton tiptoes and cuts this square, but finds the fielder situated at point
items.shortText: Malinga to Liton Das, no run

items.text: full on middle, and he shuffles onto the front foot, and presents the straight face of the bat. Defended
items.shortText: Malinga to Liton Das, no run

items.text: edged, and taken! Slinga Malinga is back! Length ball on off stump, and again moving away after pitching. Liton comes slightly forward and then tries to defend, but the ball takes the outside edge and flies straight into the hands of the diving first-slip fielder
items.postText: Shah Safeer: "Who are the hosts for this tournament? Pakistan? " -- Actually, it's India
items.shortText: Malinga to Liton Das, OUT

dismissal.text: Liton Das c Mendis b Malinga 0 (4b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

items.preText: Shakib Hasan walks in at No. 3. A strike-rate of 81. Two left-handers in the crease now. Malinga looks fitter too, by the way. He's lost some of that weight from last year.
items.text: flattens his stumps! It's a first-ball duck, and that's a Malinga classic. Full on off stump, and swinging into Shakib's body. He tries to drive towards mid on, but the ball sneaks between bat and pad, and then crashes into off stump. Late swing from Malinga does the trick. A nightmare delivery to face for your first ball.
items.postText: Naresh: "What happened to sabbir Rahman and soumya sarkar" -- Sabbir Rahman is banned from international cricket for six months. Read all about it here. Soumya has not been picked in the squad after a run of failures.
items.shortText: Malinga to Shakib Al Hasan, OUT

dismissal.text: Shakib Al Hasan  b Malinga 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

items.text: length ball on off, and he opens his bat's face to steer a back-foot punch down to deep point
items.shortText: Lakmal to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, and wide enough for Mushfiqur to shoulder his arms
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: good length outside off again, but coming into Mushfiqur on this occasion. He shuffles across to cover his off stump, and then shoulders his arms once again
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, but way too wide. Mushfiqur lets this go through to the keeper once again
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: short ball again, and this time Mushfiqur walks towards the delivery and then opens the bat's face. Runs this down to third man to get off the mark
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: Ananya: "Oh... the Old adage...... Form is temporary....but class is permanent.......!"
items.text: short on leg, and Tamim can't pull this away! Gets big on him, and hits his left wrist. He's in a lot of pain. Tamim needs a physio
items.postText: uh oh, bad news. Tamim Iqbal is walking back due to the injury. He's retiring hurt.
items.shortText: Lakmal to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Parth Gulati: "Can Malinga take a hat-trick in his comeback match? Eager to see." -- Here he is. Blonde locks and all, ready for his second over. And yes, he's on a hat-trick with Bangladesh effectively three down.
items.text: full on middle, and Mushfiqur keeps his eyes on the ball and defends with the straight bat. The ball hits the angle of his bat and flies away towards cover point
items.shortText: Malinga to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: short just outside off, and Mushfiqur looks to ramp this over the slips. But the ball's too far away, and he fails to make the connection
items.shortText: Malinga to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: short on middle, and that forces Mushfiqur to duck. Spots the length early
items.postText: Kunal: "Why are the matches not in India if India are the hosts of this tournament?" -- Because India did not want to host Pakistan in India.
items.shortText: Malinga to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full outside off, and the ball stays low on this occasion. The batsman shoulders his arms, but the delivery goes through to the keeper on the bounce
items.shortText: Malinga to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and carefully fended off the front foot. A slight outswing off every delivery from Malinga
items.shortText: Malinga to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: good length outside off, and left alone by the batsman. A maiden over to follow up the double-wicket over
items.shortText: Malinga to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: good length outside off, and angling away from his body. Sticks his bat out, and runs this shot fine past the second-slip fielder for a quick single to get off the mark
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: full on off, and he walks towards off stump, to defend off the front foot
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: Mohammed : "It's blessings in disguise for Pakistan as the matches are in UAE.They are more familiar to conditions as UAE was there home base."
items.text: full outside off, and swinging further away. The batsman chooses not to engage
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on off, but angling into his body on this occasion. The batsman takes a step forward and clips this square off his legs to midwicket
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: If you're caught in Lasith Malinga nostalgia, there can be no better time to read this epic profile of the man from Andrew Fidel Fernando for The Cricket Monthly
items.text: full outside off, and he finally goes for the expansive cover drive. Hits the under-edge of the bat though
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: good length outside off, and he frees his arms to cut this square past the fielder at point. Chase for the man as they come back for a comfortable second run
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: full just outside off, and defended with the angled bat to cover
items.shortText: Malinga to Mohammad Mithun, no run
